content.rendered:
Directed by Vivek Agnihotri.

Written by Saurabh M. Pandey.

Cast Shweta Basu Prasad(Raagini Phule (as Shweta Prasad)). Mithun Chakraborty(Shyam Sunder Tripathi). Naseeruddin Shah(PKR Natarajan). Pankaj Tripathi(Gangaram Jha). Vinay Pathak(Mukhtar). Rajesh Sharma(Omkar Kashyap). Pallavi Joshi(Aisha Ali Shah). Mandira Bedi(Indira Joseph Roy). Prakash Belawadi(GKS Anantha Suresh). V.M. Badola(Justice Kurian Abraham (as Vishwa Mohan Badola)). Asif Basra(News Channel Editor). Prashantt Guptha(Vishwendra Pratap Singh Rana). Achint Kaur(Mrs. Natarajan). Ankur Rathee(Imran Qureshi). Francisco Raymond(Vasili Nikitich Mitrokhin). Gary Tatony(British Ambassador). Olena Khudyakova(Interpreter Girl in British Embassy). Takesh Singh(News Anchor). Kaushik Chakraborty(Dr. R.N. Chug). Alina Bejenaru(E.G. Yeremenko). Mohan Kapur((as Mohan Kapoor)). Ravi Shankar Jaiswal(Indian Government Employee). Yusuf Hussain(Bakshi) . Cricknowle(Devino)

Language Hindi.

Producers Vivek Agnihotri. Pranay Chokshi. Hemant Kumar Dixit. Pallavi Joshi. Anuya Chauhan Kudecha. Ritesh Kudecha. Meenakshi Pandey. Haresh Patel. Sharad Patel. Abhinandan Patidar.

Production SP CineCore. AD Films.
